name: Puzzle Plunder
description: Puzzle Plunder is a Pirate themed match 3 game with stat building elements. Connect and match the icons to overcome obstacles as you sail the vast ocean in search of loot.
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7 (or Higher) Prozessor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Arbeitsspeicher: 2 MB RAM Grafik: Videocard with at least 512MB Speicherplatz: 50 MB verf√ºgbarer Speicherplatz Soundkarte: Any
